summary: All requirements from the BuildRequest have been successfully implemented. The diff includes: (1) RegistrationForm.tsx component with display name input, validation (min 2, max 50 chars, required), submit/cancel actions, and loading state; (2) Backend registerUser endpoint in main.mo that checks for anonymous/duplicate users, creates accounts with $10,000 cash balance, and assigns user role; (3) App.tsx integration with registration states (checking, needs-registration, registration-success, registered) and account initialization; (4) RegistrationSuccess.tsx component with welcome message, starting balance display, and call-to-action button. No missing requirements or hallucinated features detected.
